txt.en: Felled trees can be found north-west of Marton.\n\nYou should follow the trail of felled trees to discover what has been destroying them.
Follow the trail of felled trees leading north-west ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Felled trees can be found north-west of Marton.\n\nYou should follow the trail of felled trees to discover what has been destroying them.
The source of the felled trees can be found north-west of Marton.\n\nYou should discover the source of the felled trees.
Discover the source of the felled trees
You have discovered a large encampment of trolls, too close to Marton for your comfort. This path is certainly not safe for the refugees.
Trolls...a huge camp of them, too near the western route to Helm's Deep
Follow the trail of felled trees leading north-west
You have discovered a large encampment of trolls, too close to Marton for your comfort. This path is certainly not safe for the refugees.
Something on the western side of Marton has been felling trees north-west of town. This does not bode well for the western route to Helm's Deep.
